channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Adventist World Aviation
channel.desc: This is an inspiring series that follows the missionaries of Adventist World Aviation in their journey of faith and service in the Philippines. Through heartfelt interviews, discover how these pilots dedicate their lives to delivering humanitarian aid, medical support, and a message of hope to remote communities. With courage and determination, they soar through the skies and overcome challenges to fulfill their mission. Get ready for powerful stories of love, sacrifice, and miracles.
